Most-streamed albums [ edit ]

As of November 2025, Un Verano Sin Ti (2022) by Puerto Rican rapper Bad Bunny is the most-streamed album of all time on Spotify, while Sour (2021) by American singer Olivia Rodrigo is the most-streamed album by a female artist. Canadian singer the Weeknd is the only male artist with multiple albums in the top 10, while Albanian-British singer Dua Lipa is the only woman with multiple albums in the top 10. The newest album in the top 10 is currently Avicii Forever (2025) by Swedish DJ Avicii, while the oldest album in the top 10 is currently Starboy (2016) by the Weeknd.
